Resources

Processing A flexible software sketchbook and a language for learning how to code within the context of the visual arts
p5.js A javascript client-side library for creating graphic and interactive experiences, based on the core principles of Processing
Coding Train A YouTube channel dedicated to beginner-friendly creative coding tutorials and challenges
Processing Foundation Empowering people of all interests and backgrounds to learn how to program
